system.description:
This spell allows the druid to call lightning bolts from a storm. A storm of any type must be present within 360' of the druid for the spell to work, though the druid need not be within the storm itself.

Effect: The druid may call 1 lightning bolt per turn, striking any target point within 360'. Each bolt affects an area 20' across. Creatures in this area take 8d6 (8-48) electrical damage, though they may make a saving throw vs. spells to take half damage.

The druid can call a bolt each turn as long as the storm or spell duration continues.
system.duration: 1 turn per level of the caster
system.effect: Calls lightning bolts from a storm
